about_the_game:
REALISTIC GAMEPLAY:

Choose from dozens of Special Forces operators from around the world. Employ every weapon and gadget from your deadly arsenal to locate, manipulate and destroy your enemies and the environment around them. It has 3 main game modes:

- Multiplayer: It contains 2 game modes "Casual" and "Ranked" game.

- Battlefield: A secondary mode for 50v50 experiences more focused on real milsim.

- Terrorist Hunt: Differect scenarios to improve player skills against different levels of AI, playable in cooperative or solo mode.

REAL HUMAN ANATOMY:

Characters are designed with real human anatomy, adding an unprecedented level of detail and authenticity. Each shot or impact has accurate effects on the body, reflecting how it would react in real life, creating a more immersive and tactical experience. This gore system will be progressively improved throughout the updates, offering more detailed effects and graphics that will viscerally represent physical damage on the battlefield, for an even more intense and realistic simulation.

REAL BALLISTICS PHYSICS:

TakeDogs recreates the physics and behavior of projectiles during impact and penetration into surfaces depending on the caliber, weapon, distance used, among other important aspects.

Experience new strategies and tactics as TakeDogs evolves over time. Try alongside your friends in the most immersive military tactical environment to date, becoming the most experienced and dangerous mercenary in Ranked mode.

NO SKILL BASED:

One of the few current games not to have skill-based matchmaking, allowing you to face off against players of different levels for a more unpredictable experience. However, for those looking for a more competitive challenge, there is a ranking system where you can measure your performance and progress through ranks, providing a more professional experience.

content_descriptors.notes: The game shows very violent images as it represents the horror of real war.

Each shot or impact has accurate effects on the body, reflecting how it would react in real life, creating a more immersive and tactical experience. ext_user_account_notice: Epic Online Services (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: TakeDogs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i or AMD Ryzen with 4 physical cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or at least 6GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i or AMD Ryzen with 6 physical cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or at least 8GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone

short_description: TakeDogs is a war simulator, you will be a soldier fighting against the enemy for your territory. This game replicates real human anatomy and terminal ballistics of weapons 1:1.
